ComicInfo.Penciller: Alfredo Alcala,E.R. Cruz,Nick Cardy,Ruben Yandoc,E. R. Cruz,Rubeny,Alfredo Alcala
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Hangmen of Specter Island?: Nikos Kosta, a criminal, finds himself in an abandoned prison, haunted by the ghosts of other prisoners he betrayed.
The Fangs of the Phantom Hound!: A ghostly dog saves two children from a couple of escaped prisoners.
Visit from a Strange Specter: Oliver Sloane is forced by a ghost to decide who will perish, his wife or his son.
ComicInfo.Title: The Hangmen of Specter Island?; The Fangs of the Phantom Hound!; Visit from a Strange Specter
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
